alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 8:18PM CDT until July 02 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Fayette County in west Tennessee... Shelby County in west Tennessee... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 818 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Millington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Collierville, Germantown, Millington, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Somerville, Ellendale, Frayser, Eads, Warren, Macon, Oakland, Piperton, Gallaway, Rossville and Braden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
